text:
Ну да, не спорю, наверное, это, типа, не по-мужски.
    Гордиться глупо. Наш девиз: «Не благодаря, а вопреки!»

First, sadness as an emotion clearly has nothing to do with it.
     On the contrary, it seems, crying, for a moment I became happier

Ah, insults will be short-lived.
    Fighting lovers end in orgies

In vain do you find the game stupid.
     Everything is possible in them!

It's raining and they won’t let me out.
     I'll look at the thunderstorm from the balcony ...

I will be honest and sincere always
    And this is probably my misfortune

Lass ihn Geld sparen und lass ihn gehen,
     und ich werde trinken, damit der Himmel heiß wird!
